name: Crown Chakra
description: The Crown Chakra represents our ability to be fully connected spiritually. It is the center of enlightenment and spiritual connection to our higher selves.

name: Third Eye Chakra
description: The Third Eye Chakra is the center of our intuition and foresight. It governs our perception, imagination, and inner vision.

name: Throat Chakra
description: The Throat Chakra is the voice of the body, a pressure valve that allows energy from the other chakras to be expressed. It governs communication and self-expression.

name: Heart Chakra
description: The Heart Chakra is the center of love, compassion, and kindness. It connects the lower chakras of matter and the upper chakras of spirit.

name: Solar Plexus Chakra
description: The Solar Plexus Chakra is the core of our personality, identity, and ego. It controls our personal power, self-worth, and confidence.

name: Sacral Chakra
description: The Sacral Chakra is the center of our creativity, sexuality, and emotions. It governs our ability to accept others and new experiences.

name: Root Chakra
description: The Root Chakra represents our foundation and feeling of being grounded. It is associated with survival issues such as financial independence, money, and food.
